title: How to Draw a Maple Leaf

steps.headline: Draw a triangle with a curved base.
On top of the triangle draw zigzag lines that will look like a crown.
Draw more zigzag lines on the left and right sides of the triangle.
Draw a long "U" shape at the bottom of the triangle.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
Draw a cross.
steps.description: The lines don’t need to be perfectly straight. Place the horizontal line slightly below the center.

steps.headline: Draw two slanted lines connected to the center of the cross.
Draw more slanted lines connected to your previous lines.
steps.description: This will be the veins of your leaf.

steps.headline: Outline your leaf with curve and zigzag lines.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
If you want straight lines use a ruler
text: Drawing a Red Maple Leaf Draw a triangle with a curved base.  On top of the triangle draw zigzag lines that will look like a crown.  Draw more zigzag lines on the left and right sides of the triangle.  Draw a long "U" shape at the bottom of the triangle.  Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.  Colour your drawing.  Create a Green Maple Leaf Draw a cross. The lines don’t need to be perfectly straight. Place the horizontal line slightly below the center. Draw two slanted lines connected to the center of the cross.  Draw more slanted lines connected to your previous lines. This will be the veins of your leaf. Outline your leaf with curve and zigzag lines.  Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.  Colour your drawing.
sentences: Drawing a Red Maple Leaf Draw a triangle with a curved base.
On top of the triangle draw zigzag lines that will look like a crown.
Draw more zigzag lines on the left and right sides of the triangle.
Draw a long "U" shape at the bottom of the triangle.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
Create a Green Maple Leaf Draw a cross.
The lines don’t need to be perfectly straight.
Place the horizontal line slightly below the center.
Draw two slanted lines connected to the center of the cross.
Draw more slanted lines connected to your previous lines.
This will be the veins of your leaf.
Outline your leaf with curve and zigzag lines.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
